name: Weather App
description: Application that makes use of open weather API to display daily and 5 day forecast including a range of weather values and emoticons.

name: Quiz App
description: A basic quiz application to test knowlege on coding concepts and tools.

name: Password Generator
description: A application that generates a password based on users desired parameters.

name: Movie and Show Scraper
description: By implementing movie API's a team and I were able to create an application that tells the user where a desired flick can be viewed between all the different streaming platforms.

name: DND Character Generator App
description: Making use of yet another api and now a database, my team and I were able to generate standard DND characters based of chosen classes and allow users to reference the characters made at a later date.

name: Widgets on Widgets
description: With a group of fellow developers we were able to create a outdoors based application to ease the process of enjoying time outdoors while being aware of possible enviromental factors.
